response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe holds significant value for individuals like yourself. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we estimate its worth to be $1,200,000 to us. However, recognizing that your valuation might differ based on your specific needs and circumstances, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to ensure you receive unparalleled value while allowing us to maximize the return on our investment. We look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
